translation.en: There is enough fish for everyone.
-You have to serve me first. -No, I was here first.
translation.es: - Tienes que atenderme primero.- No, yo llegué primero.

translation.en: Ekah, you need to serve me. I live far off.
translation.es: Ekah, tienes que atenderme. Vivo lejos.

translation.en: Yes, yes, I know who came first and who was last.
translation.es: Sé quién llegó primero y quién al último.

translation.en: OK, let's do this-- whoever stands in line, will get extra fish.
translation.es: Bien, hagamos esto,el que haga fila tendrá pescado extra.

translation.en: [in English] See, take this one. [in Kamtok] Buy something for yourself.
translation.es: Toma estos 1000. Compra algo para ti.

translation.en: Keep it! You need it more than I do.
This business would be nothing without you.
translation.es: Este negocio no será nada sin ti.

translation.en: [in English] Thank you. [in Kamtok] Thank you.
[in English] We'll go house. We'll go house.
Because the fish is well roasted.
translation.es: Porque el pescado está bien cocinado.

translation.en: [in English] You know why we give you the name, Ekah?
Why'd we give you that name?
[in Kamtok] Because it was your mother's name.
translation.es: Porque era el nombre de tu madre.

translation.en: When I look at you, all I see is my mother.
translation.es: Cuando te miro, solo veo a mi madre.

translation.en: [in English] Even the way you burn this fish, you burn it like my mama.
translation.es: Incluso la forma en que quemas el pescado,lo haces como mamá.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] If I don't take care of you,
I want you to know, our hard work,
translation.es: Quiero que sepasque nuestro arduo trabajo…

translation.en: [in Kamtok] If you ask for the top three fish people in this village... [in English] ...they will call my name.
translation.es: Si preguntas por los tresmejores pescadores, dirán mi nombre.

translation.en: And when they call my name, they will call your name, too.
translation.es: Cuando digan mi nombre,también dirán el tuyo.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Keep up the good work.
Papa, if I ask you something...
You be like your mommy plenty now?
[in English] I be like my mama plenty.
[in Kamtok] Do you love my mother?
You are too young to understand.
[in English] When you grow, we will talk. [in Kamtok] Do you hear me?
[in Kamtok] I don't want to ever leave you.
This can never happen to you.
You will not be a slave, in any man's house.
translation.es: No serás esclava de ningún hombre.

translation.en: The teacher is waiting for her fish. Rush there.
translation.es: La maestra espera su pescado. Apresúrate.

translation.en: [in English] This fish is too small.
[in Kamtok] That's how you always buy it.
[in English] Are you kidding me? This fish is small.
I've been buying from Solomon, he should understand.
translation.es: Le he comprado a Solomon.Debería entender.

translation.en: [Solomon, in Kamtok] The teacher wasn't in school?
[in English] Then why waste time so?
[in Kamtok] Papa, I saw kids singing school songs. I love it.
translation.es: Papá, vi a niñoscantando canciones. Me gustó.

translation.en: How much Kiki's mother owe us?
translation.es: ¿Cuánto nos debe la madre de Kiki?

translation.en: [in English] Six thousand five hundred, Papa.
[in Kamtok] Huh, go and call your Uncle Lucas.
translation.es: Ve y llama a tu tío Lucas.

translation.en: Tell him to come fast... Let's go and collect that debt.
translation.es: Dile que venga rápido.Iremos a cobrar esa deuda.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] She might die very soon.
Die with all of that education?
You sound like education is important.
translation.es: Hablas como si la educaciónfuera importante.

translation.en: Only lazy and stupid people go to school.
translation.es: Solo los vagosy los tontos van a la escuela. Es una pérdida de tiempo y dinero.

translation.en: Everyone I know in this village, who dared to be educated is poor, ma.
translation.es: Todos los que conozco que se atrevierona tener educación son pobres.

translation.en: See, eh, that lazy boy, Peter. [in Kamtok] He still lives with his parents.
translation.es: Hagamos una lista.Peter el flojo, aún vive con sus padres.

translation.en: [in English] Joe too, the same thing.
[in Kamtok] Foolish Barbara decided to join them, too.
translation.es: La tonta de Barbaradecidió unirse a ellos también.

translation.en: Barbara's case is heart-breaking. [in English] A long story.
translation.es: El caso de Barbara es desgarrador.

translation.en: She went to school to study, and instead got pregnant.
translation.es: Fue a la escuela a estudiar y se embarazó.

translation.en: [girl, in Kamtok] Mama, you know I hate school.
translation.es: Mamá, sabes que odio la escuela.

translation.en: I prefer to be a fish girl rather than go to school.
translation.es: Prefiero vender pescadoque ir a la escuela.

translation.en: Or even get married like Aunty Rita.
I will buy you garri, so you can eat it with fish.
translation.es: Te compraré garripara que lo comas con pescado.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Solo, how did you find this beautiful place?
[in English] I'm a fisherman! I'm a fisherman!
[in Kamtok] It was here... [in English] ...when my papa ask my mama, if they can marry.
translation.es: Aquí, mi padrele propuso matrimonio a mi madre.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Yes, it is very beautiful.
And the way I like you,
only in calculator it will show up.
translation.es: solo se vería en una calculadora.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] ...even a calculator cannot show it.
[in Kamtok] You know, I cannot make a good family, if I don't have a good wife.
translation.es: No puedo tener una buena familiasi no tengo una buena esposa.

translation.en: [in English] You are the woman who done touched my heart.
translation.es: Eres la única mujer que amo de verdad.

translation.en: Any time I look inside your eyes,
translation.es: Cada vez que miro dentro de tus ojos,

translation.en: my body just makes some kind...
I want you to be my woman.
Be my woman, we could make some fine family, me and you.
translation.es: Sé mi mujer,podríamos ser una buena familia.

translation.en: That I dream about, you know, ever since...
translation.es: Ese siempre ha sido mi sueño.

translation.en: -[in Kamtok] Is that a yes? -[in English] Yes!
[in Kamtok] You see why I say you melt my heart?
translation.es: ¿Ves por qué digoque me derrites el corazón?

translation.en: Thank you for the beautiful shoes. I like them a lot.
translation.es: Gracias por los hermosos zapatos.Me gustan mucho.

translation.en: [in English] Ah! I could do everything for my Barbara.
[Ekah, in Kamtok] What is she saying?
and one pen, can change the world."
translation.es: y un bolígrafo pueden cambiar el mundo".

translation.en: "If one man can destroy the world,
translation.es: "Si un hombre puede destruir el mundo,

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Wh-- What is her name?
This is what killed your mother.
I will buy you a new fish barn next month. OK?
translation.es: Te compraré una cinta nuevael próximo mes, ¿sí?

translation.en: So you can roast fish very well.
translation.es: Para que puedas asar bien el pescado.

translation.en: Your father go, see a friend.
translation.es: Tu padre fue a visitar a su amigo.

translation.en: Ekah. -[in Kamtok] Yes, uncle. -You are a very good child.
translation.es: - Ekah, eres muy buena niña.- Sí, tío.

translation.en: If one of my three boy, them, they cook like you so,
translation.es: Si uno de mis tres hijostrabajara duro como tú,

translation.en: I would have been a happy man.
[in Kamtok] Your father is very respected here,
translation.es: Tu padre es muy respetado aquí…

translation.en: [in English] No change, eh. [in Kamtok] You should never change.
Have you ever asked yourself why all these educated kids are poor?
translation.es: ¿alguna vez te has preguntadopor qué esos niños educados son pobres?

translation.en: You understand? They are very lazy kids.

translation.es: La educación no es para mujeres.

translation.en: Has an educated person ever bought fish from you,
They are poor. We even feed them.
Stay just the way you are. We like you as you are.
[in Kamtok] Let nobody deceive you with education. Education is bad for women.
translation.es: Que no te engañen con la educación.Es mala para las mujeres.

translation.en: -[both in Kamtok] How are you? -I'm all right.
He says I will start school on Monday.
translation.es: Dice que empezaré la escuela el lunes.

translation.en: I don't want to go to school. Please, give me an excuse to tell him.
translation.es: No quiero ir a la escuela.Por favor, dame una excusa para decirle.

translation.en: Sorry, I have to go. We'll talk some other time.
translation.es: Lo siento, debo irme.Hablaremos en otro momento.

translation.en: [in English] Why you wake up late, so?
[in Kamtok] You had too much work yesterday?
The new kick-starter is working fine.
-What did you say? -Where is your father?
[woman in Kamtok] Please serve my fish, I have to go.
Madam, I beg you. If you can't wait, then you go to a different place.
[in English] I said, if you no feel wait, then you go different place.
translation.es: Si no puede esperar,vaya a comprar en otro lado.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] I'm leaving. [in English] Give my money.
[in Kamtok] Didn't I pay you? [in English] Give my balance.
Madam, I beg no just start.
[in Kamtok] You never give me nothing, and you can't trick me. Never!
translation.es: No me dio dinero y nunca podrá engañarme.

translation.en: -Madam, please don't be mad. -If not for you, I would have left.
translation.es: - Señora, no se enoje.- De no ser por usted, me habría ido.

translation.en: -I'll serve you-- she forgot. -It is only because of you.
translation.es: - Yo la atenderé. Ella lo olvidó.- Solo por usted.

translation.en: Don't be angry, please understand. I have heard you.
translation.es: - No se enoje. Entienda, por favor.- Sí.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] So, she even has the change.
Please don't be angry. Please understand.
translation.es: Por favor, no se enoje. Entienda.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] This is a joke, right? [in English] You know time?
[in Kamtok] Lucas, I didn't come here to joke with you.
translation.es: Lucas, no vine a bromear contigo.

translation.en: You can't ask for a debt, at this time.
translation.es: No puedes cobrar deudas a esta hora.

translation.en: I gave you the money in these times.
translation.es: Te di el dinero a la misma hora.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Based on calculations, I can only pay you next month.
translation.es: según mis cálculos,puedo pagarte el mes que viene.

translation.en: I don't have the money now.
[in Kamtok] Lucas, enough of your stupid jokes.
I am not joking. I don't have money. Next month.
translation.es: No estoy bromeando.No tengo el dinero. El próximo mes.

translation.en: Lucas, you are a liar. [in English] Lucas, you lie.
[in Kamtok] Don't we see you selling coconut water by the sea every day?
translation.es: ¿No te vemos vendiendo todos los días?

translation.en: [in English] Who give you the power to come to my compound, and curse me?
I do owe you? [in Kamtok] Lucas, Mustapha is telling the truth.
You cannot dribble me like Samuel Eto'o, on a football pitch.
translation.es: No puedes driblarmecomo Samuel Eto'o en una cancha de fútbol.

translation.en: Lucas, if you don't pay my money...
translation.es: Lucas, si no me pagas el dinero…

translation.en: [in English] You come my house, you can't threaten me.
[in English] I go cover my eye...
I'll count from one to five.
[in Kamtok] When I open my eyes, and you're still here, I promise you...
translation.es: Si sigues aquí cuando abra los ojos,te prometo…

translation.en: one of you will be dead.
Eh, what is this? [in Kamtok] You don't know how to joke?
[in English] Eh, my brother. [in Kamtok] Let's fix this like men...
translation.es: Eres mi hermano.Arreglemos esto como hombres.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] My brother, you will be dead if you don't pay my money.
translation.es: Mi hermano, vas a morirsi no me pagas el dinero.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] The money is in my pocket.
[in Kamtok] Let's fix this like brothers.
translation.es: Arreglemos esto como hermanos. Por favor.

translation.en: [in English] Sule, that's all I have. I tell you... you give me some time, no?
translation.es: Sule, es todo lo que tengo.Por favor, dame un poco de tiempo.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] That's all I have right now.
Lucas, you must finish paying me my money.
[in English] OK. You go take firewood?
You're not gonna need to buy firewood again for two year.
translation.es: No necesitarías comprar leña de nuevo.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Drink it while it's still hot.
It will cure your cough. Drink it.
[in Kamtok] Is something disturbing you? You look worried.
The misunderstanding with that woman should not disturb you.
translation.es: El malentendido con esa mujerno debería molestarte.

translation.en: Do you understand? Don't worry, drink up.
Drink it before it gets cold [in English] Drink.
translation.es: Bebe, antes de que se enfríe. Bebe.

translation.en: I want to go to school.
School is not for fish people like we.
translation.es: La escuelano es para pescadores como nosotros.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] That is a bad idea.
What will those same people say...
when I go to school and start making money?
translation.es: cuando vaya a la escuela y gane dinero?

translation.en: I mean, a lot of money.
Nobody in this house would need to go fishing, every day, 24/7.
translation.es: Nadie en esta casanecesitaría pescar día y noche.

translation.en: Our lives would be changed forever.
They say, a blind person cannot lead another.
translation.es: Un ciego no dirige a otro ciego.
La pesca es para los jóvenes.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] What would happen when we got old and couldn't go fishing?
translation.es: ¿Qué pasará cuando envejezcamosy no podamos ir a pescar?

translation.en: God has blessed us with just one kid.
translation.es: Dios nos ha bendecido con un solo hijo.

translation.en: What God has blessed us with, is fishing.
translation.es: Dios nos ha bendecido con la pesca.

translation.en: [in English] You say you want to go to school...
translation.es: Dices que quieres ir a la escuela.

translation.en: You asked me the other time, if I like your mama.
translation.es: La otra vez me preguntaste… si quiero a tu mamá.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Do you want to know the answer now?
[in English] I never ever liked my skin.
translation.es: Nunca me quise a mí mismo.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Every love and care I had...
translation.es: Todo el amor y afecto que tenía…

translation.en: I gave it to your mother.
translation.es: se lo di a tu madre.

translation.en: When my mother and brother Lucas
translation.es: Cuando mi madre y mi hermano Lucas

translation.en: tried to say anything bad about her,
translation.es: intentaron decir algo malo de ella,

translation.en: I kicked my mother out of the house.
translation.es: eché a mi madre de la casa.

translation.en: Nobody loves your mother more than me.
translation.es: Nadie ama a tu madre más que yo.

translation.en: You don't love her more than I do.
translation.es: No la amas más que yo.

translation.en: It seems the devil took over her.
translation.es: Parece que el diablo se apoderó de ella.

translation.en: She started talking to me like a mad woman.
translation.es: Comenzó a hablarme como una loca.

translation.en: has accepted to pay every dime you spent on me,
translation.es: aceptó pagar cada centavoque gastaste en mí,

translation.en: -I will pay you back. -No, no, no.
[in Kamtok] No, you can't utter such words.
I beg. [in Kamtok] Let me go.

translation.es: ¿Esto es lo que hace la educación?

translation.en: -That man doesn't love you... -Please, hold it!
translation.es: - Ese hombre no te ama.- Por favor, basta.

translation.en: [in English] Do I look like a kid? Oh, you want to teach me about love?
This whole place is a mental prison.
translation.es: Este lugar es una prisión mental.

translation.en: I wouldn't want her to suffocate in this madness.
translation.es: No quiero que ellase asfixie en esta locura.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] ...than let you make the same mistakes as your mother.
translation.es: que dejarte cometer sus mismos errores.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] You hear me? You hear me?!
-[in English] Thank you. -[in Kamtok] I'm sorry, too.
Didn't you say you do not want to go to school?
translation.es: ¿No dijisteque no querías ir a la escuela?

translation.en: and made a big deal out of it.
When my father died in the fishing waters,
translation.es: Cuando mi padre murióen las aguas de pesca,

translation.en: my uncle promised to send me to school.
translation.es: mi tío prometió enviarme a la escuela.

translation.en: He has been sending money for school fees, but my mom has been spending it.
translation.es: Envía dinero para pagar la escuela,pero mi mamá lo ha gastado.

translation.en: Yesterday, after the fight, he bought me two uniforms,
translation.es: Ayer, después de la pelea,me compró dos uniformes

translation.en: then this morning he went and paid my school fees.
translation.es: y esta mañana pagó la colegiatura.

translation.en: I had no idea what the teacher was saying.
translation.es: No tenía idea de lo que decía la maestra.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] I was in class but thinking about us.
translation.es: Estaba en clase, pero pensaba en nosotras.

translation.en: How we were free and enjoying being by the seaside.
translation.es: En estar libres y disfrutar de la playa.

translation.en: [teacher, in English] What are the factors of six?
What are the factors of six?
[teacher] Factors of six, I started with one.
translation.es: Factores de seis, comencé con uno.

translation.en: [teacher] So the factors of six will be...
So, we have learned the factors of six.
[in Kamtok] Take this 300 francs and buy something for yourself.
-[in Kamtok] Go home and cook, I'm hungry. -[in English] Papa, I already cooked.
translation.es: - Ve a casa a cocinar, tengo hambre.- Papá, ya cociné.

translation.en: -How about dirty clothes then? -Alreadty washed them.
translation.es: - ¿Y la ropa?- Ya la lavé también.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] OK. Go home and have some deserved rest.
[teacher, in English] If a boy takes two hours to clear a hectare of land,
translation.es: Si el niño tarda dos horasen limpiar una hectárea de tierra,

translation.en: how many minutes will four boys take to clear that same portion of land?
translation.es: ¿cuántos minutos tardarán cuatro niñosen limpiar esa misma porción de tierra?

translation.en: If a boy takes two hours to clear a hectare of land,
translation.es: Si un niño tarda dos horasen limpiar una hectárea de tierra,

translation.en: how many minutes will four boys take to clear this same portion of land?
translation.es: ¿cuántos minutos tardarán cuatro niñosen limpiar esa misma porción de tierra?

translation.en: -Two hours to clear a hectare of land... -[Ekah] Thirty minutes!
translation.es: - Dos horas para despejar una hectárea…- ¡30 minutos!

translation.en: I was thinking you'd forgotten about me.
translation.es: Pensé que te habías olvidado de mí.

translation.en: This fish keeps reducing every day.
translation.es: El pescado se reduce cada día.

translation.en: Are you sure this is fish for 2,000 francs?
You can't tell me you learnt arithmetic by giving change to your customers.
translation.es: No puedes decirmeque aprendiste aritmética dando cambio a tus clientes.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] I peep through the window every day to learn.
translation.es: Miro por la ventanatodos los días para aprender.

translation.en: [in English] Is that how you learned arithmetic?
If one girl takes one hour to wash 50 plates...
translation.es: Si a una chicale toma una hora lavar 50 platos,

translation.en: how long will three girls take to wash those similar number of plates?
translation.es: ¿cuánto tardarán tres chicasen lavar la misma cantidad de platos?

translation.en: Four people are standing in line.
John is three meters behind Laura
translation.es: John está a tres metros detrás de Laura

translation.en: and two meters in front of Peter.
translation.es: y dos metros frente a Peter.

translation.en: Paul is four meters in front of Laura.
translation.es: Paul está a cuatro metros frente a Laura.

translation.en: What is the distance between Peter and Paul?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es la distancia entre Peter y Paul?

translation.en: Does your father know about this?
I need that money before the deadline.
translation.es: Necesito ese dineroantes de la fecha límite.

translation.en: If I had that kind of money, Ekah would get a new fish barn.
translation.es: Si tuviera ese dinero,Ekah tendrían un nueva granja de peces.

translation.en: -[in Kamtok] What are you doing here? -[in English] Good afternoon.
-Do I need permission? -[in Kamtok] Not at all.
Just that people like you only come out on special occasions.
translation.es: Solo que gente como ustedsolo viene en ocasiones especiales.

translation.en: [in English] I came so that you and I could talk.
[in Kamtok] If you have anything to say, tell him here.
translation.es: Si tiene algo que decir, dígalo.

translation.en: [in English] I am not talking to you, please.
translation.es: No le hablo a usted, por favor.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Teacher Bihbih, if there is something, just say it here.
translation.es: Maestra Bihbih,si tiene algo que decir, solo dígalo.

translation.en: Have a seat, so you can be offered a drink.
translation.es: Tome asientopara que le ofrezcan algo de beber.

translation.en: -Have a seat. -[in English] No, I'm fine. Thank you.
translation.es: Tome asiento. No, estoy bien. Gracias.

translation.en: Actually, I came so that you and I could talk something
translation.es: Vine para que hablemos de algo

translation.en: [in Kamtok] In my family, we do not cheat.
translation.es: En mi familia, no hacemos trampa.

translation.en: The fish we give you is the right size.
translation.es: El pescado que le damos,es el mismo que les damos a todos.

translation.en: We thank God. [in Kamtok] Have a glass of palm wine.
translation.es: Alabado sea Dios.Tome una copa de vino de palma.

translation.en: that child, she could be the next big thing in this village.
translation.es: esa niña podría seralguien importante en esta aldea.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] All this time that I taught,
translation.es: Todo este tiempo que di clases,

translation.en: I had no idea Ekah watched through a hole to learn.
translation.es: no sabía que Ekah se asomabapor un agujero para aprender.

translation.en: [in English] My Ekah come to your school? Yes.
translation.es: - ¿Mi Ekah fue a su escuela?- Sí.

translation.en: And the good thing about it is, I asked some very hard question today...
translation.es: Y lo bueno es quehoy le hice preguntas muy difíciles

translation.en: And to even be more sure, I asked more question...
translation.es: para estar segura, hice más preguntas

translation.en: [in Kamtok] ...and she answered all of them.

translation.es: es una bendición para su familia.

translation.en: Are you out of your mind?
[in English] I'm not joking. I'm very serious.
translation.es: No bromeo. Hablo muy en serio.

translation.en: In fact, you should get her enrolled in school.
She could benefit from the opportunities, other people, in school.
translation.es: Podría beneficiarse de las oportunidadesde la gente en la escuela.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Why do bad luck always choose your house?
translation.es: ¿Por qué la mala suertesiempre elige tu casa?

translation.en: [in English] Again and again. [in Kamtok] Before it was Barbara,
translation.es: Una y otra vez. Primero, fue Barbara.

translation.en: [in English] My Ekah go to school?
If school was that good, you will not be dressed like this.
translation.es: Si la escuela fuera tan buena,no estaría vestida así.

translation.en: You look like a replica of Pinocchio! Nonsense, sit down!
[in Kamtok] You want to become like your mother?
-[in English] No, Papa. No. -[in Kamtok] You want to be stubborn?
[in Kamtok] Will you set your foot in that school again? [in English] No, Papa.
[in Kamtok] Will you go to that class again? No, Papa! Never! [screams]
-I can't hear you! -I will never go there again, Papa!
Will I see you in that school again?
translation.es: - ¡No te escucho!- ¡Nunca más! - ¿Te volveré a ver en la escuela?- Nunca, lo prometo.

translation.en: I will never go there again, Papa! I promise!
translation.es: - ¿Te volveré a ver en la escuela?- Nunca, lo prometo.
- No te oigo.- Te lo prometo, papá.

translation.en: -Solo, you are a strong man. -[Ekah crying]
-You are a strong man. -[Ekah continues crying]
Solo, you are a strong man.
[in Kamtok] I want to warn you to stay away from my family.
translation.es: Le advierto que se aleje de mi familia.
Lleve su locura a otro lado.

translation.en: Don't put your madness in my daughter's head.
translation.es: No meta sus locurasen la cabeza de mi hija.

translation.en: I love her the way she is.
I'm warning you for the last time.
This is what I don't like.
translation.es: Esto es lo que no me gusta.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] You are becoming too stubborn.
Ekah got me really angry. I got her well beaten.
translation.es: Ekah me hizo enojar, así que le pegué.

translation.en: I witnessed it. You did the right thing.
I do the same to my boys when they are stubborn.
translation.es: Eso hago con mis hijos cuando son tercos.

para sacarlaantes de que destruya esta institución.

Why you have to lock her up?
Why do you people have to lock her up?
translation.es: - ¿Por qué la encerró?- No te concierne.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] It's none of your business. Nobody invited you into this.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué la encerró?- No te concierne. - Nadie te invitó a venir.- Señor Lucas, esto es una barbaridad.

translation.en: [in English] Mr. Lucas, this-- this is barbaric.
translation.es: - Nadie te invitó a venir.- Señor Lucas, esto es una barbaridad.

translation.en: [in English] I don't want marriage, I don't want marriage.
You cannot be doing this kind of thing. She is only 12. Lucas--
translation.es: No puede hacer eso.Solo tiene 12 años. Lucas…

translation.en: I am very well respected here.
If I ask anyone to jump, they jump.
translation.es: Si le pido a alguien que salte, salta.

translation.en: If I tell them to eat debris, they do it without hesitation.
translation.es: Si les digo que coman basura,lo hacen sin dudarlo.

translation.en: Don't come here and try to tell me what to do.
translation.es: Si les digo que coman basura,lo hacen sin dudarlo. No vengas a decirme qué hacer.

translation.en: This is none of your business. Leave this place.
translation.es: Esto no es asunto tuyo. Vete de aquí.

translation.en: Lucas, you cannot marry her off.
She is only 12. I cannot accept that. I cannot accept that.
translation.es: Solo tiene 12 años. No puedo aceptar eso.

translation.en: Lucas, I cannot accept it. You cannot marry Ekah off.
translation.es: No puedo aceptarlo.No puedes casar a Ekah.

translation.en: You cannot do that. This is barbaric. This is barbaric.
translation.es: No pueden hacer eso. Esto es de salvajes.

translation.en: Cross the line. [in Kamtok] I dare you to cross that line.
translation.es: Te reto a cruzar esa línea.

translation.en: Madam Bih. [in English] Please tell me something good.
translation.es: Señora Bih, por favor, dígame algo bueno.

translation.en: They have locked her up waiting to be delivered to her husband, sir.
translation.es: La tienen encerradapara entregarla a su esposo, señor.

translation.en: How can people be so evil?
translation.es: ¿Cómo puede la gente ser tan malvada?

translation.en: It's a common practice for them.
translation.es: Es una práctica común entre ellos.

translation.en: Most of the young girls don't even see anything wrong with it.
translation.es: La mayoría de las chicasni siquiera lo ven mal.

translation.en: And what really squeezes my heart is, how they want to bury such a dream.
translation.es: Y lo que me lastima el corazónes cómo quieren enterrar ese sueño.

translation.en: I can't think, sir. I ca-- I can't think.
translation.es: No se me ocurre nada, señor.

translation.en: Please, sir, can I have some water to drink?
-Search the whole house. -Are you out of your mind?
translation.es: - Revisa toda la casa.- ¿Te volviste loco?

translation.en: If I hear pin from you again,
translation.es: Si vuelvo a oír de ti,

translation.en: [in Kamtok] you will know what I am capable of!
[in English] Ekah is not here. I've had enough of this brutality.
translation.es: Ekah no está aquí.Me harté de esta brutalidad.

translation.en: Stop embarrassing me. Don't even try me yet! Don't even try me!
translation.es: - Deja de avergonzarme.- ¡Ni intentes pelear conmigo!

translation.en: [Bihbih] I said, Ekah is not here.
translation.es: Dije que Ekah no está aquí.

translation.en: I told you Ekah is not here, now leave my house.
translation.es: Te dije que Ekah no está aquí,fuera de mi casa.
Dije que salgan de mi casa.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Bihbih, my brother, Sule must have his bride.
translation.es: Bihbih, mi hermano Suledebe tener a su esposa.

translation.en: Let's go before Ekah runs too far.
translation.es: vámonos antes de que Ekah huya muy lejos.

translation.en: If I find out you helped Ekah to run away from marriage,
translation.es: Si descubro que ayudaste a Ekaha huir del matrimonio,

translation.en: You understand? I will shut it down.
-Hello, uncle. -[in English] You don't see Ekah?
[in Kamtok] I just saw her running towards the seaside.
translation.es: La vi corriendo hacia la playa.

translation.en: Can you help me cross to the other side?
translation.es: ¿Me ayudas a cruzar al otro lado?

translation.en: Are you talking about Solomon's daughter?
We have to cross over. There's no time.
translation.es: Tenemos que cruzar. No hay tiempo.
¿Estás seguro de que Ekah se fue?

translation.en: Or is she hiding somewhere here?
translation.es: ¿O se esconde en algún lado aquí?

translation.en: She crossed over, sir. With another canoeist--
translation.es: Cruzó al otro lado, señor,con otro canoísta.

translation.en: Do you know this other canoeist...
What's his name again, I think Efofa?
[in Kamtok] Grand, grand, I am not lying, she crossed over.
translation.es: Hermano, no estoy mintiendo, ella cruzó.

translation.en: [in English] Why are you looking me so, grand? You look me as you think I lie.
translation.es: ¿Por qué me miras así? No miento.

translation.en: I swear to God, if I am lying, let my mother be stricken by thunder.
translation.es: Lo juro, si no,que le caiga un rayo a mi madre.

translation.en: -What are you doing? -[in English] Remove your clothes!
If I tell you I am not confused, then I'll be a liar.
translation.es: Si te dijeraque no estoy confundido, mentiría.

translation.en: We stand to lose a lot if we do not participate.
We stand to be mocked and undermined if we send in a dormant candidate.
translation.es: Se burlarán de nosotros y nos socavaránsi enviamos a un candidato débil.

translation.en: we cannot go for a competition for another three years, so tell me...
translation.es: no podremos competiren tres años. Así que dígame,

translation.en: what kind of miracle should we be expecting
to at least represent us in an average way?
translation.es: para que, al menos,nos represente alguien promedio?

translation.en: Ekah is completely out of the question now.

translation.es: Es una más de esas niñas.

translation.en: -That's so sad. -But we have two more options.
translation.es: - Qué triste.- Pero tenemos dos opciones más.

translation.en: The first will be a miracle.
We somehow convince Alhaji Sule to enrol Ekah.
translation.es: Convencemos a Alhaji Sulepara que inscriba a Ekah.

translation.en: That will be definitely be an earth-shaking one.
-Fine. How are you guys? -We are very fine.

translation.es: Ekah me hizo hablar en lenguas.

translation.en: You gave me a sweet girl.
I can have her all day. No breaks.
translation.es: Puedo tenerla todo el día. Sin descansos.

translation.en: She tasted like fresh cocoa yam mixed with palm oil.
translation.es: Sabía a taro frescomezclado con aceite de palma.

translation.en: -[both laugh] -Didn't I tell you? I told you.
translation.es: ¿No te lo dije? Te lo dije.

translation.en: I have not been out of this house in three days.
translation.es: Hace tres días que no salgo de esta casa.

translation.en: The wine is too sweet to go anywhere.
translation.es: El vino es demasiado dulcecomo para salir.
- No puedo ir a ningún lado.- Sule.

translation.en: -You have done me well. I will be back. -OK.
translation.es: - Hiciste algo bueno por mí. Ya vengo.- Está bien.

translation.en: -I have a gift for you. -OK. Waiting.
translation.es: - Tengo un regalo para ti.- Bien. Esperaré.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] You paid your debt very well. [in English] Thank you. Thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you...
translation.es: - Pagaste muy bien tu deuda.- Gracias.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] When you give me something nice, I have to return that favor.
translation.es: Cuando me das algo lindo,debo devolverte ese favor.

translation.en: -[in Kamtok] You are a good brother. -Thanks and you, too.
translation.es: - Eres un buen hermano.- Está bien.

translation.en: He rapes me every-- every day.
[in Kamtok] Please forgive me for anything I have done wrong to you.
translation.es: Por favor, perdónamepor todo lo que te hice mal.

translation.en: Does your husband know you are here?
Your husband will not kill you. [in English] You hear me?
translation.es: Tu esposo no te matará. ¿Me oyes?

translation.en: What is it again? What is it?
Solomon, do you think I am stupid?
I have told you people that I'm not a fool.
translation.es: Les dije que no soy un tonto.

translation.en: Nobody can play over my intelligence.
Why are talking you to me like a mad man?
translation.es: ¿Por qué me hablas como un loco?

translation.en: Did you just call me a mad man?
Because I can show you real madness right now.
translation.es: Porque puedo mostrarte cómo es la locura.

translation.en: You always come here to look for your wife.
translation.es: Siempre vienes a buscar a tu esposa.

translation.en: Your wife is under your care. Not mine.
translation.es: Tu esposa está bajo tu cuidado, no el mío.

translation.en: I am giving you two options.
you and your brother will bring my wife back.
translation.es: tú y tu hermano me traen a mi esposa.

translation.en: Repay all the money you took from me.
translation.es: Me pagan el dinero que me deben.

translation.en: If you guys don't do any of these, heads will roll.
translation.es: Si no cumplen ninguna, rodarán cabezas.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Didn't I tell you, in case of any issues, you should contact me first?
translation.es: ¿No te dije que si había un problemaque me buscaras para resolverlo?

translation.en: -Why did you bring it to my brother? -No, no, no.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué fuiste con mi hermano?- No.

translation.en: I am not leaving without my wife.
translation.es: No me iré sin mi esposa.

translation.en: Sule, what is going on here? I am lost.
Then he borrowed more money from me.
Totaling 150,000 francs, so he gave me your daughter as payment.
translation.es: y me dio a tu hija como pago.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] If I don't see my money or my beautiful wife,
translation.es: Si no veo mi dinero o a mi bella esposa,

translation.en: You used my daughter to pay off your debt?
translation.es: ¿Usaste a mi hija para pagar tu deuda?

translation.en: You used my daughter to pay off your debt?
translation.es: ¿Usaste a mi hija para pagar tu deuda?

translation.en: Bro, go home. I'll fix this.
translation.es: Hermano, ve a casa. Arreglaré esto.

translation.en: Ekah. Ekah. Ekah is at Pa Juh.
-Andong. What is it? -Ekah. Ekah. Ekah is at Pa Juh.
translation.es: - Andong, ¿qué pasa?- Ekah está en Pa Juh.

translation.en: [woman, in English] What number must be multiplied by four

translation.es: Correcto. Señorita Diana,Fred hace dos sentadillas en enero,

translation.en: Fred does two sit-ups in January,
translation.es: Señorita Diana,Fred hace dos sentadillas en enero,

translation.en: how many sit-ups will Fred do in May and June combined?
translation.es: ¿cuántas sentadillas hará Freden mayo y junio juntos?
Treinta y dos en mayo y…

translation.en: Derick. How many days and hours are equal to 200 hours?
translation.es: Derick, ¿cuántos días y horasequivalen a 200 horas?

translation.en: Now, we will give room for each candidate to pose a question
translation.es: Ahora, daremos espaciopara que cada candidato haga una pregunta

translation.en: If a candidate answers their opponent's question,
translation.es: Si un candidato respondela pregunta de su oponente,

translation.en: and this opponent fails to answer the other candidate's question,
translation.es: y el oponente no respondela pregunta del otro candidato,

translation.en: that candidate will be crowned winner.
translation.es: ese candidato será coronado como ganador.

translation.en: Now, Mr. Derick, your last question to Ms. Ekah.
translation.es: Señor Derick,su última pregunta a la Srta. Ekah.

translation.en: True or false. The name "Teddy bear" is used to describe a soft toy bear.
translation.es: Verdadero o falso. Teddy bearse usa para describir un oso de peluche.

translation.en: The name comes from President Theodore "Teddy" Roosevelt,
translation.es: El nombre viene del presidenteTheodore "Teddy" Roosevelt

translation.en: who once set a bear cub free.
translation.es: que una vez liberó a un cachorro de oso.

translation.en: [Ekah] The youngest woman who win the...
translation.es: La mujer más joven en ganar

translation.en: The youngest woman to win the Nobel Peace Prize, is who?
translation.es: ¿Quién es la mujer más jovenque ha ganado el Premio Nobel de la Paz?

translation.en: [in Kamtok] She was shot by the Taliban in 2012.
translation.es: Le dispararon en la cabeza en 2012.

translation.en: [in English] But she did not die.
[in Kamtok] My girl, Annabel must go to school.
translation.es: Mi hija Annabel debe ir a la escuela.

translation.en: [mouthing, in English] My name is Diana Ekah.
because... because I wanted to go school.
translation.es: porque… porque quería ir a la escuela.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] I know my father loves me.
translation.es: Sé que mi padre me ama.

translation.en: Where I come from, the fish people

translation.es: no creen en educar a las niñas…

translation.en: I can't even believe I'm standing here today as the best.
translation.es: No puedo creerque esté aquí hoy como la mejor.

translation.en: Best all-round student in a school such as this?
translation.es: ¿La mejor estudianteen una escuela como esta?

translation.en: And thank you, Nnlom Nnam Hand For Children,
translation.es: Y graciasa la Asociación para Niños Nnlom Nnam,

translation.en: Most of you know my story.
Making it from the far-flung beach of Menchum right up to this podium,
translation.es: Llegar desde la playa de Menchumhasta este podio,
van más alláde los deseos y la imaginación.

translation.en: in our body towards that passionate relentlessness,
translation.es: de nuestro cuerpohacia esa apasionada inquietud.

translation.en: who is ready to burn with you
translation.es: que está lista para arder contigo

translation.en: towards the actualization of your dream.
translation.es: hacia la realización de tu sueño.

translation.en: For being my light in a place of no lights.
translation.es: Por ser mi luz en un lugar sin luces.

translation.en: I dedicate this today to you,
and may your soul rest in peace.
translation.es: y que tu alma descanse en paz.

translation.en: "There are two powers in this world."

translation.es: el otro, el de la pluma".

translation.en: Congratulations, Bodian Tech, and happy graduation to all of you.
translation.es: Felicidades, Bodian-Tech,y feliz graduación para todos.

translation.en: And see you on the other side.
translation.es: Y nos vemos del otro lado.
